Data Models¶

class data_models.data_model.DataModel[source]¶

Base class for the data models that allows them to easily convert to dict which can be converted to json

to_dict()[source]¶

Converts the object to a dict

Returns:
dict representation of the object
class data_models.alliance.Alliance(*args)[source]¶

Data Model for holding information about 3 teams that form an alliance

Args:
args (list): a list of team numbers or Team objects
class data_models.low_level_stats.LowLevelStats[source]¶

Data Model that holds low level statistics (average, min, max, total, standard deviation)

Note:
This should not be created directly and instead made using from_list()
static from_boolean(list_)[source]¶

Creates a LowLevelStats from a list of bools

static from_float(list_)[source]¶

Creates a LowLevelStats from a list of floats

static from_int(list_)[source]¶

Creates a LowLevelStats from a list of ints

static from_list(list_)[source]¶

Create the LowLevelStats from a list of data points

Args:
list_ (list): a list of int, float, or bool that is used to aggregate the low level statistics
class data_models.match.Match[source]¶

Data model that represents a match

is_blue(team_number)[source]¶

Returns whether the team is on the blue alliance in this match

is_red(team_number)[source]¶

Returns whether the team is on the red alliance in this match

class data_models.scout_accuracy.ScoutAccuracy(**kwargs)[source]¶

Data model that contains all the information about the error between this particular scouts data and The Blue Alliance <thebluealliance.com>`_

total()[source]¶

Tallies the error from each individual match scouted

class data_models.scouted_match_accuracy.ScoutedMatchAccuracy(**kwargs)[source]¶

Data model that contains the information about a scouts data error when compared to The Blue Alliance for a specific match

class data_models.super_match_data.SuperMatchData(**kwargs)[source]¶

Data model that contains the data collect by a Super Scout for a match

class data_models.team_calculated_data.TeamCalculatedData(**kwargs)[source]¶

All the calculated data for a team

class data_models.team_dt_feedback.TeamDTFeedback(**kwargs)[source]¶

Feedback given by the drive team about our alliance partners

class data_models.team_logistics.TeamLogistics(**kwargs)[source]¶

Logistics about a team collected from The Blue Alliance <thebluealliance.com>_

class data_models.team_match_data.TeamMatchData(**kwargs)[source]¶

Data collected by a match scout about a specific robot in a specific match

class data_models.team_pick_ability.TeamPickAbility(**kwargs)[source]¶

Data about a team’s strength as a specific type of pick

class data_models.team_pit_data.TeamPitData(**kwargs)[source]¶

Data collected by pit scouts

class data_models.team_ranking_data.TeamRankingData(**kwargs)[source]¶

Data about a team’s current or predicted ranking
